entries.journal_entry_description: Disable some of the haywire droids in the lower level and bring back their memory chips.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use the elevator to head down to the lower level.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Disable the droids till you have enough memory modules.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Disable the Droids in the Droid Repair Center
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The droids have been disabled. Use the elevator to return to the main level.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to return to the Main Level
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Loche with your Memory Chips
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Return to Loche in the Ranged Combat Training Room
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You gathered all the needed memory modules, and were given a pistol as a reward
